meanings.sent1: She had munts of toys in her room.
meanings.sent2: The store had munts of candy for sale.
meanings.sent3: He was surprised by the munts of balloons at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with munts of stars on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overflowing with munts of colorful flowers.

meanings.sent1: She munts her room every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: He munts the dishes after every meal.
meanings.sent3: The robot munts the house while the family is away.
meanings.sent4: The wind munts away the fallen leaves from the yard.
meanings.sent5: The waves munts the sand on the beach, leaving it clean.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in some countries.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for munts before traveling.
meanings.sent2: The souvenir cost a few munts.
meanings.sent3: She found a jar filled with munts from different countries.
meanings.sent4: In that country, you can buy a meal with just a few munts.
meanings.sent5: The beggar collected munts from kind passersby.
